channel.title: How to get friends to join my server since i dont have a router!?
channel.description: ok i have windows vista and i only got a modem and i don't have a router to port forward so i don't know what to do to get my friends to join my server, can anyone help me??

item.title: How to get friends to join my server since i dont have a router!?
item.dc:creator: @LOLMFAO LOLMFAO
item.description:
@LOLMFAO wrote:

You have to create a network and have your friends download hamachi join your hamachi network then have them type in your hamachi IP into the client where it asks for IP and then they can login

(Oh yeah don’t forget to have your server running)

Read full topic
